caption.title: Two nested study areas are shown: (1) eastern Australia (the political jurisdictions of Queensland and New South Wales), and (2) southeast Queensland, generally depicted by a box.
caption.p: The currently known locations of genus Triunia (T. erythrocarpa, T. montana, T. robusta and T. youngiana) are shown. The eastern Australia bioclimatic model (SDM1) prediction of potential habitat distribution of T. robusta under baseline climatic conditions (1990) is also shown. The map was generated in ArcGIS v10.2 24.
